To perform and deliver with steadfast commitment and integrity to achieve excellence and 
strengthen my company’s position in the market.

2.content:
Joabson Guedes 
Rua 4, Casa 112, Macaé - RJ  Brazil| +55 22 99600-6301 | Joabson2010@hotmail.com 
 
Objective 
Position: Procurement & Materials 
Dynamic and Results-Driven Oil & Gas Professional | 20+ Years of Expertise in Procurement, Contracts, and 
Supply Chain Optimization 
 
With over two decades of proven experience in the oil and gas industry, I bring a strategic approach to 
procurement, contract management, purchasing supervision, and warehouse coordination. My expertise 
lies in streamlining supply chain operations, fostering strong vendor partnerships, and implementing cost-
control measures that enhance operational performance and align with organizational objectives. 
 
I specialize in optimizing procurement and materials management, aligning them with business goals to 
enhance efficiency and maximize value. My focus on excellence and delivering results makes me a valuable 
asset in supporting operations and driving success in the energy sector. 
 
Ready to bring my expertise to a forward-thinking organization and contribute to its growth and success. 
 
Education 
• 
MBA in Logistics and Supply Chain | 2024 | FITEC 
• 
MBA in Controllership, Auditing, and Forensic Accounting | 2024 | FITEC 
• 
MBA in Petroleum and Gas Engineering | 2010 | FUNCEFET/UNIG 
• 
Bachelor's Degree in Accounting | 2020 | UFF – Federal Fluminense University 
• 
Technical Degree in Occupational Safety | 2021 | IFF –Federal Fluminense Institute 
• 
Bachelor's Degree in English Language | 1998 | UERN – State University of Rio Grande do Norte 
• 
Bachelor's Degree in Production Engineering (in progress) | Cândido Mendes University 
 
Certifications 
• 
Lean six sigma green belt | 2019 | EDTI – Rio de Janeiro 
• 
International Procurement lead buyer certification | 2018 | GE International (Houston, USA) 
• 
Free fall lifeboat coxswain training | 2011 | Petrofac (Aberdeen, UK) 
• 
Certification in Accounting by CFC (Federal Accounting Council) 
 
 
Languages 
• 
Portuguese: Native 
• 
English: Fluent 
• 
Spanish: intermediate   
 
 
Skills and Expertise 
• 
Procurement Leadership: Extensive experience managing both international and local 
procurement contracts, ensuring efficiency, compliance, and value creation.   
• 
Risk Management: Proven ability to analyze and mitigate financial, quality, and safety risks, 
safeguarding operational continuity and standards.   
• 
Inventory and Cost Optimization: Skilled in implementing strategies for inventory optimization and 
cost reduction to drive organizational profitability.   
• 
SAP Expertise: Advanced proficiency in SAP modules (procurement, materials, and financial), 
maximizing system utilization for streamlined operations.   
• 
Supplier Development: Adept at evaluating and developing suppliers with a strong focus on 
financial and quality performance metrics.   
• 
Strategic Planning: Expertise in planning procurement activities for both offshore and onshore 
operations, ensuring timely and cost-effective execution.   
• 
Contract Management: Deep knowledge of contract management, emphasizing compliance with 
regulations and alignment with organizational goals.   
• 
Team Training and Support: Experienced in training and mentoring teams on procurement systems 
and operational processes, fostering efficiency and collaboration.   
This diverse skill set positions me as a strategic asset, capable of delivering exceptional results in 
complex and fast-paced environments. 
 
Professional Experience 
Halliburton Brasil 
Senior Buyer / Contracts Administrator 
October 2022 – November 2024 
• 
Responsible for local and international procurement contracts for drilling, cementing, and well 
stimulation services 
• 
Negotiated contract terms and conditions, focusing on technical services and tools for onshore & 
offshore operations. 
• 
Evaluated suppliers with a focus on quality, compliance, and financial stability. 
• 
Recorded annual savings of approximately USD 1,000,000. 
• 
Provided local support for SAP modules related to procurement, materials, and finance. 
• 
Implemented risk mitigation practices concerning financial, quality, and safety issues. 
• 
Managed contracts and finalization activities, ensuring legal and regulatory compliance. 
Accountant 
January 2020 – October 2022 
 
• 
Creation of MEI and CNPJ: Assists clients in registering as Microempreendedor Individual (MEI) or 
obtaining a CNPJ for business formalization, ensuring compliance with tax and legal requirements. 
• 
Tax Situation Regularization: Helps clients address overdue taxes and update their records with the 
Brazilian tax authorities (Receita Federal). 
• 
Issuance of Payment Documents: Generates necessary tax payment documents, such as DARFs, for 
federal and local taxes. 
• 
Bookkeeping and Financial Reporting: Organizes financial records, tracks income and expenses, and 
prepares required financial reports for tax filings and business management. 
• 
Tax Filing: Files tax returns, including for small businesses under the Simples Nacional tax regime, 
ensuring compliance with all tax obligations. 
• 
Payroll and Employee Management: Manages payroll, ensures tax and benefit compliance, and 
registers employees in the social security system. 
Baker Hughes 
Senior Buyer 
April 2017 – December 2019 
• 
Negotiated and managed contracts for local and international procurement of goods and services 
for drilling operations and transportation of materials and personnel. 
• 
Prepared and analyzed maintenance contracts for bases and workshops. 
• 
Recorded annual savings of approximately USD 300,000. 
• 
Provided support to the team with internal purchasing and inventory transfer activities between 
group companies. 
• 
Assessed and mitigated risks related to financial, safety, and quality concerns. 
Seadrill 
Senior Materials Coordinator 
May 2011 – August 2014 
• 
Coordinated and planned procurement of materials and services for offshore drilling and 
maintenance operations. 
• 
Implemented cost reduction strategies and inventory optimization, resulting in annual savings of 
USD 1 million. 
• 
Managed transportation and material transfers between bases and platforms, both locally and 
internationally. 
• 
Responsible for managing transportation and logistics service contracts. 
• 
Coordinated internal audit processes and inventory control, focusing on continuous 
improvement. 
 
Halliburton Overseas (Angola) 
Procurement Supervisor 
March 2007 – May 2011 
• 
Supervised an annual procurement budget of USD 40 million, overseeing operations across 3 bases 
and 12 departments in Angola. 
• 
Negotiated with global and local suppliers, achieving annual savings of USD 1 million. 
• 
Reduced the number of active suppliers by 40% and implemented inventory control 
improvements, decreasing E&O (Excess & Obsolescence) by 20%. 
• 
Developed supplier evaluation processes and optimized the procurement system. 
• 
Trained local teams and implemented new processes in SAP. 
Halliburton Brasil 
Senior Buyer / Contracts Administrator 
March 1996 – March 2007 
• 
Negotiated and managed contracts for local and international procurement in drilling, cementing, 
stimulation, and transportation of materials. 
• 
Implemented cost-reduction strategies, with average annual savings of USD 200,000. 
• 
Evaluated and managed suppliers, focusing on quality and financial efficiency. 
• 
Provided ongoing support for SAP modules related to procurement, materials, and finance. 
 
Notable Projects and Achievements 
• 
Reducing Costs: Led efforts to find and implement cost-saving opportunities, saving up to $1 million 
annually and improving financial performance. 
• 
Optimizing Inventory Management: Introduced better inventory strategies, cutting idle stock by 
20% and improving resource use. 
• 
Improving Operations: Created and implemented new processes for supplier evaluation, contract 
management, and logistics, making operations more efficient, faster, and compliant with company 
standards. 
These accomplishments demonstrate my proactive approach to problem-solving and my ability to generate 
measurable value, positioning me as a results-oriented leader in procurement and supply chain 
management. 
 
References: upon request
